column4: quien me ayuda con gparted quiero tener aceso a otro disco duro http://i50.tinypic.com/5d5vua.png
can somebody help me with gparted i want to access these 13 gb
if you mean those 11gb, you must format it as a new partition before you can use it.. right click > new
then change the ownership.. chown -R yourname:yourgroup /mountpartition
not sure myself, but i think the command is 'sudo mount -t ext4 /dev/sda2 /media/punk
but make sure you created /media/punk first.. 'mkdir /media/punk'
okay.. try issue this command -> sudo mkdir /media/punk && sudo mount -t ext4 /dev/sda2 /media/punk && chown -R punk:punk /media/punk
